name: <io::Take<T> as io::Seek>::seek

core::num::<impl u64>::checked_add_signe.doc:
Checked addition with a signed integer. Computes `self + rhs`,
 returning `None` if overflow occurred.


io::Take::<T>::position.doc: Returns the number of bytes read so far.

core::convert::Into::into.doc: Converts this type into the (usually inferred) input type.

core::num::<impl u64>::wrapping_sub.doc:
Wrapping (modular) subtraction. Computes `self - rhs`,
 wrapping around at the boundary of the type.
